forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will mix with rain at times this afternoon. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will become heavy at times late. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 30cm or more of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow will become heavy at times late. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of a foot or more.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 2C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 37F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low 27F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light snow later at night. Low -2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light snow later at night. Low 31F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow tapering off in the evening. Decreasing cloudiness late. Low near -5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy late. Low 26F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow flurries and snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 33F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
